DocLocalization.Name: Ordnet Bekleidung / Belag einem Bauteil zu - Relation

DocAttribute.Name: RelatingBuildingElement
DocAttribute.Documentation: Relationship to the element that is covered. It includes building elements for coverings such as flooring or cladding, or distribution elements for coverings such as sleeving or wrapping.

DocAttribute.Name: RelatedCoverings
DocAttribute.Documentation: Relationship to the set of coverings that are assigned to this element.
